description: Personal runners trainer for you - very simple and lightweight application. Official mobile application of Run-log.com website. - Track your activities on all Android Smartphones and Android Wear smatwatches (Sony Smartwatch 3, LG G Watch R,  ASUS ZenWatch etc.) - Send your workouts to Run-log.com and watch (Workouts of friends, maps, stats, events, Forums) - Integration with Bluetooth Smart heart rate monitors
descriptionHTML:
Personal runners trainer for you - very simple and lightweight application. Official mobile application of Run-log.com website.
- Track your activities on all Android Smartphones and Android Wear smatwatches (Sony Smartwatch 3, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch etc.)
- Send your workouts to Run-log.com and watch (Workouts of friends, maps, stats, events, Forums)
- Integration with Bluetooth Smart heart rate monitors
comments: If you lock your phone it just stops you work out. What's the point of this app if you can't use it.
good... but um not sure that the distance measurement is accurate.
The timer stopped working suddenly and distance tracking is not accurate
Please add top speed feature per lap or per activity,it will be lot helpful
Great simple app.   Can you allow the smartwatch app to display miles per hour instead of only km/h?  Thanks!
Simple,  straight to the point, easy to use, and it's definitely accurate. It's also very easy to modify setting such as switching from km to miles.
recentChanges: - Training plans preview and morning notification (Currently plans managing is on the website only)
- Altitude graph below the activity map
